description: Defines the StaffCard widget for displaying staff member information in a Flutter app; includes UI layout and interactions for editing and deleting staff entries.

classes.name: StaffCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays detailed information about a staff member, including expansion for additional info and options to edit or delete.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI, displaying a card with staff info and an expandable section for details.

methods.name: _buildInfoRow
methods.description: Helper method to create a labeled row of staff information.

methods.name: _getRoleColor
methods.description: Returns a color associated with the staff member's role.
